Actions.Text: REFERRED TO TOURISM, PARKS, ARTS AND SPORTS DEVELOPMENT
REFERRED TO TOURISM, PARKS, ARTS AND SPORTS DEVELOPMENT

Title: Directs the commissioner of parks, recreation and historic preservation to cooperate with municipalities in establishing adopt-a-park programs
Summary: Directs the commissioner of parks, recreation and historic preservation to cooperate with municipalities in establishing adopt-a-park programs; municipalities may enter into agreements with volunteer groups for provision of services.
LawSection: Parks, Recreation and Historic Preservation Law
LawCode: Amd ยง3.09, Pks & Rec L; amd ยง277, Gen Muni L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the parks, recreation and historic preservation law and the general municipal law, in relation to authorizing an adopt-a-park program
